trans-unit.source: This tool aggregates data from multiple sources to help you make the best decision when choosing which gloves to while handling chemicals. As with any computer program, it may have bugs or contain incorrect data. We will assume no liability for any damage this tool may indirectly cause.
This site uses some data from INRS' ProtecPo. This web software comes with its own disclaimer, reproduced here:

ProtecPo Disclaimer: ProtecPo is a tool helping users to select polymer materials for skin protection when working with substances. ProtecPo's selection algorithm is based on robust modelling of the interactions between substances and polymers, it has been enriched and validated by the addition of physico-chemical and empirical data from several sources. Nevertheless, it remains possible that the algorithm may make a selection error. ProtecPo's recommendations should be considered as a first step in the selection of polymers, helping to orient your choice towards appropriate skin protection. However, they are in no way a substitute for experience with or performance tests of your protective materials. ProtecPo does not take the actual conditions where substances and protective materials are used into account.
In all cases, you should change your protection immediately upon contact with a chemical product, in particular when fine disposable protections are used.
Search for a substance or glove

This page allows you to quickly search for the best gloves given a solution. Alternatively, you can also use the main search bar and the button "Add to solution".
Best gloves results for this solution
error Calculation impossible: the sum of the proportions of each substance doesn't make up to 100%.
Add substances to search for gloves
Click on any glove to see its specifications and a list of tested chemicals.
The rating provided here is a general rating. It is not specific to a chemical and doesn't indicate whether a particular glove will resist well to a particular chemical.
error No glove found: There is no glove in the database with these types. Please see the list of all gloves for alternative options.
Sorry! No resistance data was found for this glove or substance.
Tip: search for glove: to list gloves & search only in gloves.

Use the searchbar above to search for substances and gloves. You can also compose solutions along the way - they will be sent to the ProtecPo service to help you find the most suited gloves for your work.
How to remove gloves? Here is an helpful video that demonstrates how to remove contaminated gloves safely: How to remove gloves?
All gloves. You can find here a list of all the gloves we offer: All gloves
The following results are provided by INRS's ProtecPo.
error No recommendation can be made because of a too high uncertainty in the composition.

warning The relevance of the recommendation below may be affected by the uncertainty with regard to the composition. Thick protections should be favoured. Multi-layer laminated materials, made up of co-polymers, also exist.
